summary: Completed comprehensive backend testing of DXY Terminal API (A4). All required features working correctly with 100% test pass rate.
passed_tests: GET /api/fractal/dxy/terminal?focus=90d - regime mode, tradingEnabled=false, action=HOLD, 2 warnings
Rank switching (rank=1 vs rank=2) - different replay.matchId values confirmed
Bands monotonicity validation - p10 ≤ p50 ≤ p90 ordering maintained
Array length consistency - all bands and hybrid paths have same length (30 points)
Input validation - invalid focus and rank parameters properly rejected with 400 status
